mapper.update: update tb_gateway_mode set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hex = #{hex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hex_success = #{hexSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hex_fail = #{hexFail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, command, hex, hex_success, hex_fail, `order`, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_gateway_mode where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, `name`, command, hex, hex_success, hex_fail, `order`, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from tb_gateway_mode

SELECT * FROM tb_gateway_mode
command != 'NONE'
GROUP BY `order` ORDER BY `order`

SELECT gm.*,ma.uuid,ma.open_devices,ma.close_devices,ma.description FROM tb_gateway_mode gm LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_mode_action WHERE uuid=#{uuid}) ma ON gm.id=ma.mode_id WHERE gm.command != 'NONE'
AND gm.name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{name}, "%")
ORDER BY gm.`order`

SELECT gm.*,ma.uuid,ma.open_devices,ma.close_devices,ma.description FROM tb_gateway_mode gm LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_mode_action WHERE uuid=#{uuid}) ma ON gm.id=ma.mode_id WHERE gm.command != 'NONE' AND gm.id=#{modeId} LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM tb_gateway_mode
`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND command != 'NONE'
GROUP BY `order` ORDER BY `order`

SELECT IFNULL(pm.`name`, gm.`name`) AS `name`,gm.* FROM tb_gateway_mode gm LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM tb_place_mode WHERE place_id=#{placeId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1) pm ON gm.id=pm.mode_id
AND command != 'NONE'
GROUP BY gm.`order` ORDER BY gm.`order`
